q: to gain share in search, mobile drives significant growth in usage, and display becomes more meaningful," wrote Heath Terry of Canaccord, who boosted his price target to$ 800 from$ 750. While the management reshuffling adds a minor degree of uncertainty, we believe Google has significant price performance catch-up ahead, he added. Most did not see the CEO shift as signaling any major change in the company's strategy. Page has been part of a triumvirate running Google- along with Eric Schmidt and co-founder Sergey Brin -

Fortunately the museum also has a huge gift shop, and the looters found it first. "Those people were idiots," Zahi Hawass , head of Egypt's department of antiquities, told Time. They looted the museum shop. Thank God they thought that the museum shop was the museum. Others dispute the level of damage done, however. A third GOP bill, backed by Rep. Diana DeGette Mike Pence ( R-Ind.), aims to block health clinics, specifically Planned Parenthood, from receiving federal funding if they perform abortions. Mike Pence says the American public is learning that their taxpayer dollars are subsidizing these organizations that are promoting abortion across this country. Rep. Diana DeGette was among the Democrats Wednesday asking why Republicans are more focused on defunding Planned Parenthood than on creating jobs. The actress plays mean cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the hit musical series, and says she can see similarities between her on-screen role and the pop mogul. If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell , Jane Lynch explains. "You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her.
